attributes.action: Automatically grant all people who have the D1 driving licence to be given the C1 licence category
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Automatically grant all people who have the D1 driving licence to be given the C1 licence category provided they take the LGV theory test, these two vehicle sizes are very similar and there is no need to prevent one from not having the other.

Due to passenger safety i dont think it would be good to grant D1 to C1 licence holders.
